story_24_03000/2401_1001_0100_10:
Whoa, Team Break’s looking even stronger than
they were before!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_0200_10: For them to have gained this much strength...
story_24_03000/2401_1001_0400_10:
Hehe! You’ve got your back against the wall!
Now, hand over your Pokémon!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_0600_10: Huh? Are you really in a position to refuse?
story_24_03000/2401_1001_0800_10: Stay tough! Don’t listen to them!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_1000_10: It’s all right now. They’re gone.
story_24_03000/2401_1001_1300_10: I know. It’ll be all right. Please cheer up.
story_24_03000/2401_1001_1400_10: That’s right! We’ll drive Team Break away!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_1700_10: Let’s go, Elesa! Other people need our help!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_1800_10: I understand your fear all too well.
story_24_03000/2401_1001_2100_10:
Your partner Pokémon is amazing. It stood by
your side to protect you during Team
Break’s attack.
story_24_03000/2401_1001_2200_10: Pokémon feel fear just like Trainers do.
story_24_03000/2401_1001_2300_10:
But even though your Pokémon was scared, it
gathered its courage and never gave up.
story_24_03000/2401_1001_2400_10:
So you should have courage, too, as your
Pokémon’s Trainer.
story_24_03000/2401_1001_2700_10:
We might not be able to continue our match, but
we can stop Team Break. We can’t let them get
away with what they’re doing!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_2800_10:
You and your Pokémon should get to a safe place
and wait this out.
story_24_03000/2401_1001_3100_10:
I-I’m all right! I don’t want to lose to
Team Break anymore!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_3200_10:
No, it’s more than that! I WON’T lose to them ever
again! I won’t lose to anyone who does such
terrible things!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_3400_10:
I’m scared, but I won’t let Team Break win. They
can’t control me. So please!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_3500_10: Please continue with your match, Elesa!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_3600_10:
I’m sure if you do, many sync pairs out there will
see it and find their courage. Just like I did!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_3700_10: I want everyone in the stadium to see our courage!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_3800_10: The courage that will defeat Team Break!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_4200_10:
Hah! You didn’t think a little back pain would be
enough to keep me down, did you?
story_24_03000/2401_1001_4300_10:
Leave Team Break to us!
Go and enjoy your match!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_4500_10:
You know how strong my Pokémon and I are,
right, Dad? There’s no way we’ll lose to
Team Break!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_4600_10:
But if you insist, I don’t mind taking your spot in
the battle!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_4800_10:
Fight on, [Name:PlayerNickname ]! Show them
all what you can do!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_4900_10:
Show everyone just how strong and brave
you are!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_5100_10:
They were all running scared until a moment ago,
but now they’re all working together?
story_24_03000/2401_1001_5200_10:
Hee hee. What a marvelous crowd. Though they’re
stealing our spotlight...
story_24_03000/2401_1001_5300_10:
How could we not want to battle when they’ve
shown us such shining courage!
story_24_03000/2401_0401_5600_10:
Right! We’ll show Team Break and all those brave
people in the audience what we can do!
story_24_03000/2401_0302_5700_10: Let’s show them what we’ve got!
story_24_03000/2401_0402_5800_10:
That’s right! Let’s show Team Break and all those
brave people in the audience what we can do!
story_24_03000/2401_1001_5900_10:
Let’s have the most courageous, most brilliantly
shining battle ever!
